LanguageData.DMS_CivilianChild01.description: Since [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a gravity-free environment, [PAWN_pronoun] childhood was spent in countless rehabilitation training and treatments. Although these treatments have allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to move freely in a gravity environment, [PAWN_pronoun] physical condition is still far inferior to that of children of the same age.
LanguageData.DMS_CivilianChild01.title: Low G adjuster
LanguageData.DMS_MilitaryChild01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the colonial fleet stationed on the planet's surface, and his biological father is unknown. Fortunately, the soldiers stationed in the camp treated [PAWN_pronoun] as their children, allowing [PAWN_pronoun] to have a relatively complete childhood.
LanguageData.DMS_MilitaryChild01.title: Garrison child
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild01.description: Due to his outstanding performance in the military academy [PAWN_nameDef] was trained as a reserve officer since he was a child. and achieved the rank of warrant officer before reaching adulthood.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild01.title: Reserve officer
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild02.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a colonial planet full of turmoil, and uses [PAWN_pronoun] flexible skills to become a messenger and shuttle through the battlefield front lines full of electromagnetic interference. After the war, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to return to school for education.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild02.title: Child orderly
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild03.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents disappeared in the line of duty while he could still remember it. Due to the military martyrdom clause of the colonial fleet, he received a series of compensations to support him in completing the officer academy course.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild03.title: son of martyrs
